column7: KEFI Minerals engages in the discovery, exploration and exploitation of mineral deposits primarily within Saudi Arabia. It explores for gold and copper mineralisation, as well as precious and base metals. KEFI Minerals was founded in 2006 and is based in Nicosia, Cyprus.

Diethelm Keller Holding, along with its subsidiaries, engages in marketing, brand management, logistics and travel businesses. The company provides sourcing, marketing, sales, distribution and aftersales services. It also offers marketing, brand building and distribution services for medium-sized enterprises. Diethelm Keller Holding was founded in 2000 as a result of a merger between Diethelm and Edward Keller. The company is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

Webcor Group is an agro-industrial food production and distribution company, specialising in sourcing, manufacturing, distributing and trading of soft commodities and fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG). The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.

Jardine Matheson Holdings, through its subsidiaries, engages in engineering and construction, transport services, insurance broking, property investment and development, retailing, restaurants, luxury hotels, motor vehicles and related activities, financial services, heavy equipment, mining, and agribusinesses primarily in Greater China and south-east Asia. The company is based in Central, Hong Kong, and was founded in 1832.
column37: Wai Sam Wong, managing director of Myanmar Jardine Schindler Limited. "The training centre demonstrates Schindler's long-term commitment to safety and quality to deliver outstanding customer service through professionally trained technicians. This is the key element in driving sustainable growth in Myanmar."

column7: Radisson Hospitality, AB, is a hotel group. Originally founded in 1960 by Scandinavian conglomerate SAS Group as a hotel, it became a listed company in 2006. The global headquarters of Rezidor also relocated to Brussels, Belgium circa 1989. In 2005, Carlson also acquired 25% shares of Rezidor Hotel Group from SAS Group. Since 2007, SAS Group ceased to be a shareholder of the company. In 2010, Carlson Companies acquired the controlling influence (more than 50.1% shares) on the listed company. In 2012, Rezidor Hotel Group started to integrate with direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, which both companies would collectivity known as Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group. Carlson Hotels, Inc. and subsidiaries, including Rezidor Hotel Group, were sold to Chinese conglomerate HNA Group in 2016. However, in 2018, the CarlsonRezidor group was re-sold to a consortium led by Jin Jiang International Holdings. In 2018, Rezidor Hotel Group AB was renamed to Radisson Hospitality AB. The direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, Inc., had become Radisson Hospitality, Inc., the whole hotel group also had a new trading name Radisson Hotel Group. Radisson Hotel Group operates as a subsidiary of China-based Shanghai Jin Jiang International Hotels.

Radisson Hospitality, AB, is a hotel group. Originally founded in 1960 by Scandinavian conglomerate SAS Group as a hotel, it became a listed company in 2006. The global headquarters of Rezidor also relocated to Brussels, Belgium circa 1989. In 2005, Carlson also acquired 25% shares of Rezidor Hotel Group from SAS Group. Since 2007, SAS Group ceased to be a shareholder of the company. In 2010, Carlson Companies acquired the controlling influence (more than 50.1% shares) on the listed company. In 2012, Rezidor Hotel Group started to integrate with direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, which both companies would collectivity known as Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group. Carlson Hotels, Inc. and subsidiaries, including Rezidor Hotel Group, were sold to Chinese conglomerate HNA Group in 2016. However, in 2018, the CarlsonRezidor group was re-sold to a consortium led by Jin Jiang International Holdings. In 2018, Rezidor Hotel Group AB was renamed to Radisson Hospitality AB. The direct parent company, Carlson Hotels, Inc., had become Radisson Hospitality, Inc., the whole hotel group also had a new trading name Radisson Hotel Group. Radisson Hotel Group operates as a subsidiary of China-based Shanghai Jin Jiang International Hotels.
Holcim Group, formerly known as LafargeHolcim, is a building materials firm. The company was formed by the merger of Holcim and Lafarge in July 2015. It is headquartered in Jona, Switzerland.
column39: Lafarge South Africa, Lephema Executive Group

column7: The Netherlands-based Tuttnauer manufactures autoclaves, plasma sterilizers and washer-disinfectors. The company was founded in 1925 and is based in Breda, the Netherlands.
Kuoni is a tourist travel company. Kuoni was founded in 1906 and is currently headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

planitswiss is a full-service hospitality solutions provider that specialises in the planning and execution of tailor-made corporate events. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Lutry, Switzerland.

Fugro collects, processes, and interprets geological data. The company collects data at sea, on land, and from the air of land areas and the sea bed. The data is used in building offshore oil platforms, tunnels, roads, pipelines, factories, and communications cables, and to explore oil, gas, and minerals. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Leidschendam, the Netherlands.

Modern Energy Management delivers project lifecycle certainty to renewable energy financiers, developers, operators and investors working in rapidly expanding emerging markets. Its team of engineers and project managers develop, construct and deliver complex, profitable projects in remote, rapidly expanding international markets. The firm was founded in 2013 and is based in Singapore.

Bioengineering AG designs and manufactures production plants. It offers bioengineering products for amino acids, antibiotics, biomass (probiotics and starter cultures), bio-pesticides, biopolymers and lipids, enzymes, ethanol, flavors and fragrances, fruit juices, monoclonal antibodies, organic acids, peptides/proteins (blood factors, hormones, and growth factors), sugar derivates, vaccines, and vitamins. The company also provides bioequipment, including bioreactors and fermenters, up- and downstream equipment, probes/measuring systems, sampling and harvesting systems, agitation systems, aeration and exhaust systems, vessel accessories, pumps for sterile applications, components for sterile lines, fermenter accessories, and powder handling/mixing systems. It also designs and implements measurement and control engineering solutions for biologics, back up, and data logging and processing, as well as process analysis, management, optimization, and supervision applications. Bioengineering AG was founded in 1972 and is based in Wald, Switzerland.
column39: AMS Technologies , Bioengineering AG, Incepta Pharmaceuticals

column7: Caribbean Development Bank operates as a multilateral financial institution. The company provides project loans and technical assistance to governments, public agencies, and other entities in borrowing member countries. Caribbean Development Bank was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Saint Michael, Barbados.
Kuoni is a tourist travel company. Kuoni was founded in 1906 and is currently headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

BIA Group provides advice and support for clients in their mining, quarrying, forestry, public works and transport projects. BIA Group offers a range of equipment and accessories from manufacturers such as Komatsu, Sandvik, Bomag, Foton and Cummins. The company is based in Ebene, Mauritius.

Anheuser-Busch InBev, also known as Ab InBev, is a brewing company. It engages in the production, marketing, and distribution of beer in Latin America, North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. It offers a portfolio of approximately 200 beer brands. The company's global brands include Budweiser, Stella Artois, and Beck's; multi-country brands consist of Leffe and Hoegaarden; and local brands comprise Bud Light, Michelob, Skol, Brahma, Antarctica, Quilmes, Jupiler, Hasseroder, Klinskoye, Sibirskaya Korona, Chernigivske, Harbin and Sedrin. Established in 1366, the company is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.

The firm is ASEAN focused on helping its clients to navigate the ASEAN legal landscape. The firm was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.
Kuoni is a tourist travel company. Kuoni was founded in 1906 and is currently headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

Switzerland-based Fracht provides logistics solutions. The company offers air freight and sea freight delivery in addition to rail, barging and trucking services. Founded in 1955, Fracht is headquartered in Basel, Switzerland.

DragonEx is a cryptocurrency exchange platform. The firm was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

CrimsonLogic designs and builds e-government solutions for governments in Asia, the Middle East, Africa and the Americas. It offers services that provide real-time company and business information and deliver search, retrieval, and information transfer functions. The company also provides a legal portal that enables content providers to provide online access to a repository. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Singapore. CrimsonLogic was formerly known as Singapore Network Services and changed its name in August 2002. In February 2018, PSA International raised its shareholding in CrimsonLogic from 15% to 45%. The remaining 55% was held by Enterprise Singapore, formerly IE Singapore. On 8 August 2018, PSA International Pte Ltd, an existing shareholder of CrimsonLogic acquired majority control through an additional subscription of shares and share purchase from Enterprise Singapore Holdings. With the completion of the transaction, PSA now holds 70% of CrimsonLogic, with Enterprise Singapore Holdings retaining 30% of shares. Enterprise Singapore Holdings is a 100% wholly-owned subsidiary of Enterprise Singapore.
column37: Eugene Wong, chairman, CrimsonLogic, said: "Rwanda has an investment-friendly environment for Singapore companies and is also a very clean city. The country welcomes Singapore companies as they trust us to bring both innovation and quality in partnerships towards building their digital economy."

column7: International Workplace Group (IWG), together with its subsidiaries, provides office outsourcing services. IWG offers its services to property owners and investors, franchisees, brokers, and customers under the Regus, Regus Express, Spaces, Signature, and Open Office brands. Effective October 14, 2008, Regus Group plc became Regus plc. Regus plc was created as a holding company for Regus Group plc, to establish the company's headquarters in Luxembourg, relocating from the UK. The company was formerly known as Regus before rebranding to IWG in December 2016. In December 2016, the company relocated its head office from Luxembourg to Switzerland. IWG was established in 1989 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.

IWG was established in 1989 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.

SolarHome Pte. Ltd. leases solar energy units for rural off-grid households in Southeast Asia. It installs integrated solar energy and appliance units in customers' homes, and offers 'rent-to-own' plans of energy service subscription. The company uses the microfinance structure, Pay-As-You-Go (PAYG), which enables users to pay a monthly fees comparable to their current expenditure on legacy energy sources. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore. The company also has operations in the Philippines, Cambodia, Myanmar, and Indonesia.
China Canton Investments Ltd. operates as an investment holding company. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Singapore.

GIC is the sovereign wealth fund of the Government of Singapore. It was founded in 1981 and is based in Singapore. On 23 July 2013, GIC changed its legal name from Government of Singapore Investment Corporation to GIC.

Sakthi Trading Group is a global leader in Gold and diamond-based commodities from conflict-free zones of the West Africa and East Africa. The firm is based in Hong Kong.

Lee & Man Paper Manufacturing, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades paper and pulp in China and Vietnam. It offers various pulp products, such as dissolved pulp for use in viscoce chemical fibre, bamboo fibre, glass paper, acetate fibre and refined rayon; unbleached bamboo kraft pulp for use in ecru life paper, environmental tableware and food bags; and bleached bamboo kraft pulp for use in tissue papers, fine papers, cigarette papers and cup papers. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

The Netherlands-based De Vierschaar is the holding firm for a number of companies. The mutual activities within the group include the provision of goods and property leasing. De Vierschaar is based in Ede Gold, Netherlands.

column7: New World Development, an investment holding company, invests in, develops, and manages properties in Hong Kong, China, and internationally. Its property portfolio comprises residential estates, office buildings, shopping centres, convention centres, hotels, service apartments, and convention centres. The company is also involved in contracting activities; provision of property and facility management, transport, and other services. Further, the company is engaged in general trading, construction and civil engineering, building construction, consumer products retail, estate agency, marketing and promotion, property agency management and consultancy, liquor and tobacco sale, carpark management, piling and ground investigation, land development, bond issuing, and financing activities, as well as in foundation works. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

Yoma Strategic Holdings, an investment holding company, engages in real estate, agriculture, automotive, and luxury tourism businesses in Myanmar. The company develops gated community, residential, retail mall, serviced apartments, office towers, and landmark development projects. It is also involved in constructing residential units; rental of properties; property development and management, and design and architectural services; and advertising services, as well as operates quick services restaurants. Yoma Strategic was incorporated in 1962 and is headquartered in Singapore.

Green Leader Holdings Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the distribution of information technology products in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Systems Integration Services and Software Solutions, Mining Operation, Coal Operation, and Cassava Starch Operation segments. The Systems Integration Services and Software Solutions segment provides information technology products, systems integration, technology, software development, Internet, software solution engineering, and maintenance services. The Mining Operation segment engages in the exploration and development of coal deposits, and sale of coking coal, as well as the provision of geological survey services. The Coal Operation segment provides coal trading and logistics services. The Cassava Starch Operation segment engages in cultivation, processing, and sale of cassava starch. The company also engages in energy development and equipment trading activities; and sale of equipment and services. Green Leader Holdings Group Limited has a strategic cooperation framework agreement with Guangxi State Farms Mingyang Biochemical Group, Inc. for the mutual development of cassava industry project in Cambodia. The company was formerly known as North Asia Resources Holdings Limited changed its name to Green Leader Holdings Group Limited in September 2017. Green Leader Holdings Group Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

Heineken Holding supervises the management of the Heineken group. The company was established in 1952 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

SHV Holdings engages in energy distribution and marketing, cash and carry wholesale, industrial services, and heavy lifting and transport businesses worldwide. The company supplies liquefied petroleum gas under the Primagaz, Calor Gas, Liquigas, Super Gas, Ipragaz, Supergasbras, Xiweigas, and Gaspol brand names; distributes liquefied natural gas and renewable energy; and invests in renewable energy solutions and LPG technology, such as micro combined heat and power, and fuel cells. It also invests in joint ventures that are involved in oil and gas exploration, development, and production activities primarily in the Netherlands and the United Kingdom. In addition, the company engages in cash and carry wholesale with 161 Makro stores in South America, which sells food and non-food products to small and medium-sized retailers, hospitality industry, and the institutional market; and provides heavy lifting and transport solutions in the petrochemical, power, offshore, marine, and civil engineering sectors. SHV Holdings was founded in 1896 and is based in Utrecht, the Netherlands.

Nestle provides nutrition, health, and wellness products worldwide. Its brands include Nestle Health Science, Nestle Nespresso, Nestle Purina Petcare and Nestle Waters. The company was founded in 1866 and is based in Vevey, Switzerland.

SGS is a multinational business solutions company which provides inspection, verification, testing and certification services. It has a network of more than 94,000 employees and operates 2600 offices and laboratories. SGS's core services can be divided into four categories. Inspection: SGS provides a comprehensive range of inspection and verification services to help to control quantity and quality, and meet all relevant regulatory requirements across different regions and markets. Testing: its global network of testing facilities, enable customers to reduce risks, shorten time to market and test the quality, safety and performance of products against regulatory standards. Certification: allows customers to demonstrate products, processes, systems or services are compliant with either national or international standards and regulations. Verification: ensures that products and services comply with global standards and local regulations. SGS was established in 1878 and is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.

Nestle provides nutrition, health, and wellness products worldwide. Its brands include Nestle Health Science, Nestle Nespresso, Nestle Purina Petcare and Nestle Waters. The company was founded in 1866 and is based in Vevey, Switzerland.

column7: Shining Star International Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the business fields of real estate, commerce, hotel, education, health, decoration, sports, tourism, property management, etc. The company provides property management and business services; education investment and management, educational equipment and uniforms selling, and medical services; accommodation, hotel management, catering, and cigarette retail services; investment consulting and real estate development services; engineering management and supervision, technology consulting, and property management services; construction material selling and consulting services; and golf course construction and operation services. It also engages in the activities of business operation and management, exhibition, leashing, etc.; project investment and management, real estate development, import and export, etc.; interior decoration design and construction, landscaping design and construction, etc.; entertainment, apparatus selling, trade, etc.; real estate broker, business invitation, activity planning, etc.; real estate development and management of supporting facilities, gyms, etc.; and furniture production, management consulting, marketing plan, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hong Kong.

Diethelm Keller Holding, along with its subsidiaries, engages in marketing, brand management, logistics and travel businesses. The company provides sourcing, marketing, sales, distribution and aftersales services. It also offers marketing, brand building and distribution services for medium-sized enterprises. Diethelm Keller Holding was founded in 2000 as a result of a merger between Diethelm and Edward Keller. The company is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.

Netherlands-based Corlido Group specialises in procurement and supply chain management. Its remit includes operational buying, warehousing, logistics and all related administrative services and technical support. The company serves sectors ranging from education to oil and gas. Corlido Group was established in 1995 and is based in Emmen, the Netherlands.

Transsion Holdings, formerly known as Tecno Telecom, engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of mobile communication products. The firm was established in July 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China. The company changed its name in the second half of 2013.

Ontex engages in the development, production, and sale of hygienic disposables worldwide. It offers a range of feminine hygiene products, such as sanitary towels, panty liners, and tampons; baby products, which include nappies and wipes; and incontinence products; and adult products, such as light inco, pull-ups, belt diaper, all in one, shaped pads, and bed protection. The company was established in 1979 and is based in Aalst, Belgium.

column7: FBS Markets is a Belize-registered Forex broker which was founded in 2009. It is headquartered in Belmopan and focuses mostly on clients in Asia.

Capillary Technologies offers a customer analytics-driven integrated marketing platform that provides omni-channel solutions for retailers worldwide. It provides cloud-based software solutions that enable retail marketers to build, manage, and analyse customer data to gather deep insights and personalise customer engagement across social media, mobile, e-mail, online, and in-store channels. The company offers intelligent customer engagement suite of products through the customer engagement management platform. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Singapore, having relocated from Bangalore, India in July 2012.

Fraser and Neave, through its subsidiaries, operates in the food and beverage, property, publishing and printing industries. Additionally, it offers treasury and financial services, asset management, fund and property management and consultancy services. Fraser and Neave was founded in 1883 and is based in Singapore.

AIA Group Limited provides various products and services for insurance, protection, savings, investment, and retirement needs of individuals and businesses. It offers life, pensions, and accident and health insurance products; savings and investment products; wealth management solutions; and employee benefits, credit insurance, and retirement services. The company distributes its products and services through direct marketing, agents, and bancassurance relationships primarily in Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, China, Korea, the Philippines, Indonesia, Vietnam, India, Australia, New Zealand, and Taiwan. American International Assurance was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

column7: Anheuser-Busch InBev, also known as Ab InBev, is a brewing company. It engages in the production, marketing, and distribution of beer in Latin America, North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. It offers a portfolio of approximately 200 beer brands. The company's global brands include Budweiser, Stella Artois, and Beck's; multi-country brands consist of Leffe and Hoegaarden; and local brands comprise Bud Light, Michelob, Skol, Brahma, Antarctica, Quilmes, Jupiler, Hasseroder, Klinskoye, Sibirskaya Korona, Chernigivske, Harbin and Sedrin. Established in 1366, the company is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.

It provides inventory management, warehousing, distribution, customer order management, clinical trial logistics, patient-based solutions, and retail management assistance to doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and clinics; offers pharmaceutical wholesaling and retail management solutions for community pharmacies; provides retail pharmacy software solutions; offers pharmaceutical distribution services to public and private hospitals; and provides clinical trials logistics support and speciality contract logistics services for healthcare manufacturers. The company was founded in 1912 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

The company provides supply chain management services, such as planning and implementing of an integrated solution for the flow of business, logistic, information, and funds to small and medium sized enterprises in various industries. It also offers money lending services to individuals and corporations. column7: SolarHome Pte. Ltd. leases solar energy units for rural off-grid households in Southeast Asia. It installs integrated solar energy and appliance units in customers' homes, and offers 'rent-to-own' plans of energy service subscription. The company uses the microfinance structure, Pay-As-You-Go (PAYG), which enables users to pay a monthly fees comparable to their current expenditure on legacy energy sources. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore. The company also has operations in the Philippines, Cambodia, Myanmar, and Indonesia.
